Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class ManagerLoginController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.ManagerLoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ManagerLoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Manager Login interface. Handles the logic for manager authentication and transitions to the Manager UI.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the Manager Login Controller. Checks if an admin manager exists in the database, and creates one if not.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the FXML file (not used).
      resources - The resources used to localize the FXML (not used).

    • login

      public boolean login(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Handles the manager login action. Validates the username and password entered by the manager. Displays a success or failure message and transitions to the Manager UI on successful login.
      Parameters:
      e - The ActionEvent triggered by the login button.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise.

    • showManagerUI

      public void showManagerUI(Object eventSource)
      Displays the Manager Main UI after a successful login.
      Parameters:
      eventSource - The source of the event (usually the login button).

    • handleManagerLogin

      public boolean handleManagerLogin(String username, String password)
      Validates the manager's login credentials. Checks the provided username and password against the database records.
      Parameters:
      username - The username entered by the manager.
      password - The password entered by the manager.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.
